attributes.action: Close our borders, no one in or out until the world has COVID-19 under control
attributes.additional_details:
The only way we can stop people dying from COVID-19 is to eradicate it by shutting our borders, and then get the country moving again!

It’s better to keep the virus out and help travel industries rather than businesses closing and supporting everyone who is closed!
attributes.background:
We are an Island close our borders, no one in or out until the world has COVID-19 under control or people are vaccinated,

We control the outbreak, then shops and businesses can open again, we can get the country back moving and only have to support the travel industry not the entire nation!!

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/564165
